attributes.action: Ban travel from in and out of the uk whilst in lock down
attributes.additional_details: We need to get the country back to normal people’s lives, mental health the economy is failing the steps taken needs to be serious as clearly what they have done previously hasn’t worked hence we are in the same position as March 2020
attributes.background: The government need to stop all travel from in and out the country on this lock down as other countries have done this and they are further ahead in beating the the spread of the virus

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564165
